attributes.review: I downloaded this app yk to see what was happening and what all the hype was with me being nosy and all. Now after the app had downloaded and I signed in and all that they asked me SUPER personal question like my address, what I was wearing, my FULL name, My age, etc. Oh but of course I just swiped in the app and deleted it DUH but the next day I noticed that weird things kept happening to me like my oven started by itself and so did my washer and dryer and without even doing anything my SIRI kept go on and off asking me weird question like why did you delete the app. By now I figured I’m being hacked (which I was) so bc of this app I had to shut down my phone and everything just so that I could keep my info safe. Thank goodness this is all over but please DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS IS A WARNING!!!⚠️🚫
attributes.title: Hacked AND Personal info!!!!!!!!!!!!!!⚠️

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and all of a sudden a flock of ducks came through the door! I wanted an app not a delivery service, I could just go to some restaurant that gives way better service than this would ever give, THERES NO WAY I would recommend this app It’s manipulative and dumb and I can’t have any more ducks at my door! If I could give it 0 stars I would! 😡🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤢🤢🤢
attributes.title: The ducks ran rampant!!!

attributes.review: This app is honestly so frustrating. I’ve never experienced anything that has made me this annoyed. The app immediately asks for my phone number which is super annoying. I don’t want texts from an orange. I have immediately deleted the app because why would I stay somewhere that wants my phone number. I mean give me some privacy am I right. Anyway if someone is looking for a reason to download the app just stop trying because you will only be extremely disappointed in the end. Have a nice day and remember and apple a day keeps the orange away ☺️🧚🏼‍♀️❤️💕✨⭐️🦋🧚🏼‍♂️💖💗🥰😘
attributes.title: Dumb as dumb can be
